snippet: They are picking up the war-torn pieces in the rebel-held region, hoping someone — whether from Kiev or Moscow — can get essential services running again.
abstract: Residents of Novosvitlivka, Ukraine, have lived without light, gas, water and heat following violent combat between Ukraine’s army and rebel separatists; village is one of worst damaged in a constellation of towns and cities throughout separatist-held Ukraine that have begun, haltingly, process of rebuilding since signing of Sept 5 cease-fire.
lead_paragraph: They are picking up the war-torn pieces in the rebel-held region, hoping someone — whether from Kiev or Moscow — can get essential services running again.

headline.main: Ukrainians in the Battered East Scramble in Darkness as Winter Nears
headline.print_headline: Ukrainians in the Battered East Scramble in Darkness as Winter Nears
